description: Main Flutter frontend source code for the WikiGraph Converter app. Contains app initialization, main widget, configuration, user input handling, and network requests to backend server.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the application, setting theme and home screen.

classes.name: _ConverterScreen
classes.description: Stateful widget managing user input, validation, and network request for URL conversion.

methods.name: _oceanProfessionalScheme
methods.description: Builds a custom color scheme based on provided brightness.

methods.name: _validateUrl
methods.description: Checks if the provided URL is an HTTPS URL with a wikipedia.org host.

methods.name: _submit
methods.description: Handles the process of sending the Wikipedia URL to the backend API and updating UI based on response.
